basics.name: Stephen Puthenpurackal
basics.label: Front End Developer, Back-End Developer, Full-Stack Developer Certified, Computer Science Disciple
basics.summary: An Inquisitive Computer Science student, skilled with strong foundations in Mathamathics, Technological Acuity, Creativity, and inferential logic. Committed and Challenge driven, my ambition in life is to apply my skillsets to benet others, whether it be people around me or the corportation that I work for. My Prior occupations do not have any relation to who I am currently due to the change of study and interests during the course of my college career, but shows excellence in the ability to collaborate, communicate, and work with others effiently.

work.name: Data Entry Technician
work.location: St Francis Specialitt clinic and OBGYN
work.description: Worked with reading and writing patient documents and transcribing them onto a digital format, in regards to the doctor who needed these files to clinically diagnose and give active care to her patients.
work.summary: Worked together with staff to accomodate customers
highlights: Scanned documents and saved in database to keep records of essential organizational information.
Reviewed and updated client correspondence files and database information to maintain accurate records.
Evaluated source documents to locate information needed for each data entry field.

place.name: St Francis Specialitt clinic and OBGYN

work.name: Front Desk Receptioniost
work.description: Learned how to work as a Team with pharmacist and other pharmacy Pharmacy Technician to ensure Patients recieved and was knowledgable about their medication in a retail setting
work.summary: Worked together with staff to accomodate customers
highlights: Counted, measured, and compounded medications following standard procedures.
Located and measured medications according to prescription information, making modications as instructed by pharmacists and providers
Communicated with patients to collect information about prescriptions and medical Pharmacy Technician, Pharmacy Technician(Not Related)conditions or arrange consultations with pharmacist
Answered incoming phone calls and addressed questions from customers and healthcare providers
Resolved non-routine issues like third-party billing, computer system and customer service issues
